@oobe-protocol-labs/synapse-client-sdk

  • DasContent

Interface DasContent

On-chain and off-chain content metadata for a digital asset.

Contains the JSON schema URI, associated files, metadata attributes, and external links for an asset.

Since

1.0.0

interface DasContent {
    $schema?: string;
    files?: DasFile[];
    json_uri?: string;
    links?: Record<string, string>;
    metadata?: {
        attributes?: {
            trait_type: string;
            value: string;
        }[];
        description?: string;
        name?: string;
        symbol?: string;
        token_standard?: string;
    };
}
